channel.title: Help how do i get my 317 server to spawn
channel.description: well, i downloaded MTP V2 - Turmoil/Perfect Pking/Minigames - Best Pking source ever, "its on the server downloads list." Anyways i finally made my self owner and super donator which took a long time but it still wont let me download claws. so i wanted to ask, how can i get my 317 to spawn any item even if your not a donator like ::item 14484 1, please help and post answer quick, oh and lay out the code just incase you need any because i tryed ::pickup, and ::item on the server, still doesn't work! Please help, thank you.

item.title: Help how do i get my 317 server to spawn

every server has commands

item.title: Help how do i get my 317 server to spawn
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:6, topic:362954”]add this in client.java

search for

mypos

and under it add this

} if (command.startsWith("item") && playerRights >= 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Type like this ::item ID AMOUNT"); } } }[/quote]thank you for you help, however, mypos cannot be found in client.java, i even went to edit, and find typed mypos for both up and down and it couldn’t be found =’(

Read full topic
item.source: Help how do i get my 317 server to spawn

item.title: Help how do i get my 317 server to spawn
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

add this in client.java

search for

mypos

and under it add this

} if (command.startsWith("item") && playerRights >= 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Type like this ::item ID AMOUNT"); } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Help how do i get my 317 server to spawn

item.title: Help how do i get my 317 server to spawn
item.dc:creator: @help_with_my_server help with my server
item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:4, topic:362954”]SORRY for the wrong command!

this is the one that you need

[code=cmf]}

                if (command.startsWith("item") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
				if(!inCombat) {
				if(isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                    try {
                        String[] token = command.split(" ");
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 14879) {
if(newItemID != 14878) {
if(newItemID != 14877) {
if(newItemID != 14876) {
if(newItemID != 14880) {
if(newItemID != 14881) {
if(newItemID != 14882) {
if(newItemID != 14883) {
if(newItemID != 14884) {
if(newItemID != 14885) {
if(newItemID != 14886) {
if(newItemID != 14887) {
if(newItemID != 14888) {
if(newItemID != 14889) {
if(newItemID != 14890) {
if(newItemID != 14891) {
if(newItemID != 14892) {
if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);
}

} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn a PvP artifact! Go PK ;)!”);
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::item 995 1.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn in the wilderness!”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn items in combat!”);
}
}
}[/code]

client.java

search for

mypos

and under the code add it[/quote]i went to client.java after coping your code, then i pasted at the very bottom, is there a special place i have to put it in client.java? because idk because it still wont work. (wont let me spawn items…)

Read full topic

item.title: Help how do i get my 317 server to spawn
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

SORRY for the wrong command!

this is the one that you need

[code=cmf]}

                if (command.startsWith("item") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
				if(!inCombat) {
				if(isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                    try {
                        String[] token = command.split(" ");
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 14879) {
if(newItemID != 14878) {
if(newItemID != 14877) {
if(newItemID != 14876) {
if(newItemID != 14880) {
if(newItemID != 14881) {
if(newItemID != 14882) {
if(newItemID != 14883) {
if(newItemID != 14884) {
if(newItemID != 14885) {
if(newItemID != 14886) {
if(newItemID != 14887) {
if(newItemID != 14888) {
if(newItemID != 14889) {
if(newItemID != 14890) {
if(newItemID != 14891) {
if(newItemID != 14892) {
if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);
}

} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn a PvP artifact! Go PK ;)!”);
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::item 995 1.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn in the wilderness!”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn items in combat!”);
}
}
}[/code]

client.java

search for

mypos

and under the code add it

item.description:
@help_with_my_server wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:2, topic:362954”]this is “item” command.

} if (command.startsWith("tele") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newPosX = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newPosY = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); toX = newPosX; toY = newPosY; } }[/quote] what folder do i put it in?

item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

this is “item” command.

[code=cmf]}
}

                if (command.startsWith("item") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
				if(!inCombat) {
				if(isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                    try {
                        String[] token = command.split(" ");
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 14879) {
if(newItemID != 14878) {
if(newItemID != 14877) {
if(newItemID != 14876) {
if(newItemID != 14880) {
if(newItemID != 14881) {
if(newItemID != 14882) {
if(newItemID != 14883) {
if(newItemID != 14884) {
if(newItemID != 14885) {
if(newItemID != 14886) {
if(newItemID != 14887) {
if(newItemID != 14888) {
if(newItemID != 14889) {
if(newItemID != 14890) {
if(newItemID != 14891) {
if(newItemID != 14892) {
if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);
}

} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn a PvP artifact! Go PK ;)!”);
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::item 995 1.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn in the wilderness!”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn items in combat!”);
}
}
}[/code]
